mapper.insert: insert into DB_SYS_SYSLOG (USER_ID, CONN_DTM, USER_NAME, END_DTM, CP_IP, CP_NAME, CONN_LOG) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cpIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select USER_ID, CONN_DTM, USER_NAME, END_DTM, CP_IP, CP_NAME, CONN_LOG from DB_SYS_SYSLOG
